page.description: Returns value indiciating whether or not the Signature control is empty.

argument.name: length
argument.description: The "length" to compare the base64 encoded string to determine whether or not the signature is empty.

discussion.p: Returns true if a signature control is empty (has not been signed). The base64 encoded signature is compared against a 'length' parameter to determine if the control is empty.
If you do not pass in a *[js:length]* parameter, a default parameter value (appropriate for the type of browser you are using) is used.
Note that even if a signature control has not been signed, the base64 encoded value in the control is not be empty.
